3.name: Leak sealing bag (Chloroprene rubber)
3.flammable environment: Yes (Only when using with Vetter's original set)

4.name: Leak drainage bag (Natural rubber)
4.flammable environment: Yes (Only when using with Vetter's original set)

6.name: Emergency response containment vessel (ERCV) (Salvage Cylinder)
Mitigation Limitations: Only for metallic containers with no explosive mixture, and cylinders that are not damaged by fire or explosion-damage.

7.name: Pipe Clamp (Clamp Ø size: Smaller than 5")

9.name: Chlorine Kit A - The Kit (Carbon Steel)
Mitigation Limitations: Contain leaks from 45kg (31.87L)  and 68kg (47.85L) cylinders only
Note: Reactivity of different chemicals varies with temperature
9.Operating Pressure: Pressure Relief by User Controlled Release

10.name: Chlorine Kit A - Viton Gasket
Mitigation Limitations: Contain leaks from 45kg (31.87L)  and 68kg (47.85L) cylinders only
Note: Reactivity of different chemicals varies with temperature
10.Operating Pressure: Pressure Relief by User Controlled Release

11.name: Chlorine Kit B (Pre2014) Viton Gasket
Mitigation Limitations: Contain leaks from vales, fusible plugs, and in the side wall of chlorine one ton  containers that conform to specification DOT 106A500X only
11.Operating Pressure: Pressure Relief by User Controlled Release

12.name: Chlorine Kit B (Pre2014) Garlock 3000
Mitigation Limitations: Contain leaks from vales, fusible plugs, and in the side wall of chlorine one ton  containers that conform to specification DOT 106A500X only
12.Operating Pressure: Pressure Relief by User Controlled Release

13.name: Responder kit (urethane pad)
Mitigation Limitations: Can only be used on small leaks or cracks on initial mitigation (Below chemical resistance for eu pad)

14.name: Typhoon vacuum cleaner (304 SS used for below ratings)

15.name: Decanting pump
Mitigation Limitations: Cannot be used in confined spaces as it uses electrical supply to power up
Cannot be used in a cyrogenic environment

16.name: Hazmat pump
Mitigation Limitations: Cannot be used in confined space environment as it uses electrical supply is used to power up the appliance
